version_description:
Based on your feedback, we’ve created an easy-to-use app that lets you connect with GUESS exactly how you want: 
•Receive customized messages, event notices, behind-the-scenes videos, exclusive shopping offers and more in the newsfeed. 
•Store your claimed shopping offers, digital versions of in-store receipts and gift cards in your mobile wallet. 
•Connect your GUESS List account and use it as a digital version of your card. 
•Earn extra loyalty points just by interacting with GUESS on Facebook!
•Not a GUESS List member? No problem. Guest browsing lets you see what’s new and shop all you want. If you want to become a member, you can do that right from the app (it’s free to join!). 
•Find your closest GUESS and GUESS Accessories stores with the improved store locator. 
•Store your payment info in your account for fast, easy and secure checkout. 

Download now for free to get started!
bug fixes
Fixed issue with iOS 9.
Performance and Minor Bug fixes

Thanks for using the GUESS Jeans app!

- Apple Wallet support for your GUESS List card
- Store your GUESS gift card in the app to use in-store or in-app when checking out
- Adding and removing from the Wishlist is made easier
- Ability to quickly swipe to the next image while viewing items in Lookbook and First Look.
- Various bug fixes & performance improvements

We would love your feedback!  Email us anytime: appteam@guess.com

We've squashed some bugs.

 
We would love your feedback! Email us anytime: appteam@guess.com

Check out the completely revamped Shop section. 
Use the new In-App Chat to chat with a Stylist or Customer Care! 
We've also listened to your feedback and made performance updates while squashing bugs!

Check out the completely revamped Shop section. Use the new In-App Chat to chat with a Stylist or Customer Care! We've been listening to your feedback and made performance updates while squashing bugs!

We’ve updated the Wishlist. Upgraded the “Chat with a Stylist” feature. You can now easily share your favorite styles with the new Social Share icon on all product pages.  New onboarding screens to highlight all the features within the app. We've been listening to your feedback and made performance updates while squashing bugs!

We've made performance updates and squashed bugs!

We also updated the Wishlist. Upgraded the “Chat with a Stylist” feature. You can now easily share your favorite styles with the new Social Share icon on all product pages.  New onboarding screens to highlight all the features within the app.

Swipe to go back and forth through out the app.
Tap Shop again to quickly access the catalog.
We've also made performance updates based on your feedback while squashing bugs!

Full screen swipe to go back and forth from your favorite items. 
We've been listening to your feedback and made performance updates while squashing bugs!

Shop with confidence with our new size chart!
An improved order history page with order status, instant access to all your shopping information!
We have made performance updates and squashed some serious bugs!

All new and improved My Bag, all your favorite items where ever you are.
New upgrades to the order history page, see all your purchase history on one screen.
We've squashed some bugs and decreased load time for quick browsing.

                - Login quickly and securely using Touch ID.
                - All new and improved My Bag, all your favorite items where ever you are.
                - New upgrades to the order history page, see all your purchase history on one screen.
                - We've squashed some bugs.

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS Jeans app. Here’s what’s new:
                - Improved location based services & offers.
                - iOS Rich Messaging integration.
                - We've squashed some bugs.

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS Jeans app. Here’s what’s new:
•New Loyalty banner allows quick and easy snapshot of your reward $$ and how close you are to the next tier.
•New Reward section giving GUESS List users in an insider view of what’s new at GUESS?
•New Overview page giving users a seamless view of the perks with joining GUESS List.
•Fixed the My Bag issue and squashed some minor bugs.

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS Jeans app. Here’s what’s new:
•General bug fixes and performance improvements for our new and approved loyalty section.

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS Jeans app. Here’s what’s new:
- More details within the new loyalty section.
- Bug fix for Rich Push issue.
- General bug fixes and improvements.
Updated the app logo and introducing our new app name: GUESS 81
Updated the app logo and introducing our new app name: GUESS 81

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS 81 app. 
Here’s what’s new: 
Fixed a bug when deep-linking from chat.

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS 81 app. Here’s what’s new:
•Introducing new “Challenges” section with more ways to gain GUESS List bonus points
•Spin the wheel daily to win GUESS List bonus points
•Redesigned onboarding flow allows users to log in or sign up quicker
•Don’t have a password for your GUESS List account? Users can now easily add a password and gain access to reward status and GUESS List tier 
•Fixed deep linking issue from push notifications
•Spring cleaning – performance upgrades
•Squashed some bugs

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS 81 app. Here’s what’s new:
•Added functionality to your Wishlist
•Users can now log in to all the GUESS brand apps with the same log in credentials
•Improved how we display images while browsing
•Fixed issue for users who could not log in
•Squashed some bugs

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS 81 app. Here’s what’s new:
•Made updates to our Order History screens
•Added support for customer service requests through the chat
•Fixed issues when logging in with Face ID and changing countries
•Squashed some bugs

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS 81 app. Here’s what’s new:
oNew! “Style It” button: you can now create a full outfit from the product description page
oInternal process improvements to ensure seamless experience
oSquashed some bugs

We’re constantly working improve the GUESS 81 app and listening to your feedback. Here’s what’s new:
• New! Tap to zoom shoppable outfits.
• New! General app use is smoother and faster than ever.
• Earn rewards faster! Sign up for GUESS List and spin daily for your chance to win points and rewards, plus earn bonus points when you check in at your local GUESS store.
• Improved functionality and fixed reported bugs.

We’re listening to your feedback and working to improve the GUESS 81 app. Here’s what’s new:
•New! Complete the look. Access stylist influenced looks from any product description page
•New! Check your local GUESS store inventory and reserve the items to try on in-store or pick up and go.
•Improved Spin Wheel. We’ve loosened the slots and users can win more GUESS List Bonus points than ever before, give it a spin.
•Squashed some bugs

•Improved Spin Wheel. We’ve loosened the slots and users can win more GUESS List Bonus points than ever before, give it a spin.
•Squashed some bugs from the 5.5 Release
